name: Whatsapp Open Sans
description: Set Open Sans as default font
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://web.whatsapp.com/") {
.infinite-list-viewport,
.input-placeholder,
.chat-body,
.dropdown.dropdown-right,
.dropdown,
.emojitext,
.message-system-body,
.input-emoji,
.input-container,
.col-main,
.textfield,
.textfield-editable,
.drawer-title,
.popup-container,
.header-body,
.textfield-static,
.btn,
.multi-count,
.chat-meta,
.butterbar-wrapper,
.intro-text-container,
.inputarea {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Segoe UI', Tahoma !important;
}

.emoji {
   font-family: 'Roboto' !important;
}
}
